message.body: I need to pick up 3 things from my room. I'd lik to pass by in about 10 minutes.
I am by the airport. Coming back at night.
K
The FMCU account has only $10. I will try to deposit $200 from Wells Fargo unless u object. First Vassar payment was deducted today of $211.
K
When will u be back at the house. I'll be visiting with them until then.
About 9:30. Not sure of traffic. I will call when I am about an hour away from home.
Will be in Swarthmore in 50
K

I went all the way to giant landsdowne yesterday to fill up with cheap gas and found out that it only works with your bonus card. since we got a new one for me it has a separate no....I am not using the car tomorrow and the coupon expires on Wednesday. You might want to use your bonus card to fill up any of the three cars.
Also we need to do the 'separation agreement' or whatever it is called ASAP. I am very busy tomorrow but I will look into the logistics of it on Wednesday and will let you know...
Please do not text me after 10 pm unless it is urgent. Thanks.
I
*k
Could you please tell me How many points is your gas reward?
100. And it is not mine. It only works with your card.

That will save only 10 cents a gallon. I'd be happy to drop off my card if u want to use it. I don't have the time to go lansdowne. I read that some shell stations also give the discount but I don't if there is one near us participating.
Regarding the separation agreement. Please contact joe and don to see if the lsa has a particular format.
The discount is ten cents per hundred points so u must have had lots.
You are right. That is what it says on the coupon. But how strange because last time I used the coupon (months ago) I filled up the car with $3! Yes, it is not worth the trip at all.
K
I am not sure about asking the LSA. They have no legal authority except for marriage documents. At least that is what I understand.
You could ask them if a lawyer is needed.
I
*k
Joe says we need a lawyer. And that there are online resources.
I think it is better that you pursue that issue. I am ready to read and consult about the terms once you have a rough draft. As for getting a lawyer we simply don't have the money unless you have
Other sources. On that topic we probably will have have not enough money to cover incoming bills in August after we pay th aug 1 mortgage. It all depends on how much unemployment i will get.
I'll look into it.

You need to sign the amended return. Please let me know how u want to do that. It is easiest if I just wait on the porch because I have to mail the hard copy. Are Lua and reed here today. If so we can do this tomorrow. There will be an additional $555 but it won't be processed for 8-12 weeks.
No Lua and Reed. I am at Penn already. If you could put it on the entrance table I will sign it. How do you want it back?
Easier way: after you sign just put it in the mailbox at the post office. I will prepare the envelope.
K
I don't have the kids ss numbers with me here at McCabe. Do u have them at the house where I can find them easily?
I have them on my iPhone. Should I send them as text or email?
I'm checking online
I am going into my appointment right now. Cannot text till 1:10
I'll leave a note to remind you to enter the numbers.
Before I forget. I suggest u transfer Sorayas $500 into the checking ASAP. I put $200 in yesterday and it is down to 0 already.

It turned out that she didn't have a full $1000 in her account. That was my mistake. She had $650 in awards and about $250 in gifts. Last time I check she had 300 and some. If you still think you want to take it from her I suggest that you ask her for it.

I don't want to take anything from her. Please be careful how you phrase your ideas. The point here is that we have 0 in the checking and deductions are being made meaning we will be charged $30 or so for each deduction. I raise this issue so we can find the best solution. Another option is to transfer more from the Fargo account. If you agree to that please let me know how much so I can do it ASAP. We have only $300 in there now.
I'll be at the house from 1:45 for about 10 minutes.
I thought you had transferred all from Wells Fargo already. You might as well transfer 200. And we should not use the card at all until further notice.
I haven't been using the card except when I returned shampoo and then bought the same amount yesterday.
K
I'll transfer 200 ASAP. I am leaving the house and the tax form is on red chest.
K
Recycling needs to be at the sidewalk by 8:45 this morning.
K
Are u going to be out if the house any time this afternoon
No
Did the tax form get mailed?
Not yet
Did you fill in the ss numbers and sign it
Yes. And Soraya is going to mail it in a few minutes.
K
I will need time at the house to see the kids and work on my papers. When is a good tomorrow

I have homework and I need to be home a lot. We will need to come to a more structured agreement. I am working on a separation document, but it needs some time. At least another week. Meanwhile we need to make arrangements. Play it by ear does not work for me. About seeing the kids I suggest that for now (until we write things down) you should contact them directly and arrange to see them elsewhere. About the packing, I suggest that you come up with a deadline by which you will finish the packing (for one year). Also come up with how many times you need to come in to do that. And an approximate duration for the visits. This way we can make a schedule ahead of time. I don't want to be pressured to leave the house last minute. If there is a schedule it will be much easier.

I agree with having a more structured arrangement. Until such an arrangement is made I would ask that you be flexible since I was the one who moved. I think by next week an arrangement can be made. The sooner the better for me actually. Once a schedule is made there will be no need for me to make a packing schedule since I could take things during each visit.
It sounds like you are denying me access to the house and kids until a separation agreement has been settled. If that is what you intend I would disagree with that.

I still need to come some time tomorrow to check in with the kids and collect some documents. Could you please review and see if you will be out of the house for shopping or other activities. I prefer to come in late afternoon since the kids are not awake until after 1 or even 3 pm. Please also remember that both parties cannot avoid inconvenience. I have no Internet and am trying to complete my own work using the libraries. It is only reasonable that share the inconvenience for the sake if giving both parties access to house and kids.

I am not denying you access to the kids. You can see them elsewhere anytime you want. You can also see them in the house when you come to pack. All I am asking is that if you need to pack BEFORE the separation agreement is done then we need a packing schedule until further notice. For example a schedule for the coming ten days. Next Tuesday I will at Penn from 1-9 for example.
I will come over on Tuesday from 1-3 that is good. After that I have to leave for strayer. But again only Doda is awake at that time.
Seeing the kids outside the house is not practical at this time but I don't want to discuss that now.

I was not pressuring you to leave the house at the last minute. That is why I asked you about tomorrow afternoon. So here is my suggested packing schedule: Thursday (tomorrow) through Monday 3-5 pm and then tues 1-3.

Today I started working on Kofi so that he wakes up earlier. I am assuming that you will find a way to see the children outside the house soon. The whole point of separation is for you not to be around me and my dwelling place all the time. Because everything about you makes me extremely nervous. About the proposed schedule I will have to look at mine and let you know. What about the deadline? When are going to finish packing?
Excuse me but we did not consult about a deadline. You suggested it. Also that is not the whole point if the year of waiting.

You are in the habit if greatly exaggerating everything. I did not ask to be around the house all the time. I asked to be with my children at the house from 3 to 5 only from tomorrow through Monday. I am flexible about those days and times.
And the same principle applies to you. You can do your studies outside the house just as I a doing. As I said before we both need to bear the burden of inconvenience and to try to be fair about this.
I'm on my way to moms and will respond later
Anyway, is tomorrow from 3-5 good?

I will let you know later tonight about tomorrow. But Friday through Monday is not good at all. I want to be free to study. Maybe I can let go of one afternoon to take a break. But right now I don't know which day is good. Will let you know tonight. And please think of a deadline or talk to Joe.
I am already scheduled to meet with PAC next Wednesday.
Great
"Without an end in sight". Again I point out the exaggeration since I specified from tomorrow through Monday of this coming week. That is a limited set of days.

What I meant is that you refused to give a deadline. Which means that it is very possible you will ask again and again for similar schedules. I can't read your mind. When you don't give a deadline I have to assume it is open ended.

We are to consult. It is not right for one party to assume the other must agree with his or her suggestions. I don't know if I agree with deadline in this case especially since I should be able to visit the kids when u are out.

Why do you assume that you SHOULD be able to visit them when I am out??? We never agreed on that and I am certainly not wanting that. I don't know if it is negotiable. Talk to PAC about it on Wednesday. From my point of view I am entitled to sole custody and I am doing you a favor by letting you see them at all.
Tomorrow is good from 3:30-5:30.
I am still figuring out a time for you to come on the weekend.
Thanks

I've spent all morning on the phone dealing with Soraya's health insurance and it is still not resolved...now I am taking Kofi to the Ortho. I need to spend all my time studying this weekend. I can't promise I will be able to leave the house. If I do it will be to run a short errand or go for a short walk whenever I feel like it.
By weekend I meant Friday and Monday included.

BMC just called: me and the kids will be covered for ten months instead of 9 starting aug 1st. But I won't have the info (policy no and such) until I sign the new contract etc. will send you the info once I get it.
Wong I be covered too?
*wont
Please respond. Will I be covered by your bmc policy?
I was driving.
K
Remember we had talked about it couple of weeks ago and it is going to be an extra $400 a month to add you.
I remember now.
As soon as I get the bmc policy number I will complete the vassar waiver online and that will be settled.
Great
Just for your records. The vassar waiver deadline is aug 15 or 16
K
It's doda I'm gonna call you
K
Does your pay check actually show up on the 31st. i.e. when can we withdraw cash morning of 31 or 1?
I can't say for sure. It varies.
K

I am working with the congressman's office to hopefully cover Soraya's emergency room bill. If you have any documents that might help such as our lower summer income, whatsoever you can think of, could you please email them to me. I told her I will email her stuff tomorrow.
K
I would like to remove the bolts from Kofi and Dora's doors so it will be easier to wake them and for safety reasons. Do u agree?
I suggest that we keep things as they are for now. In my opinion much change for the boys is too detrimental at this point. Too early.
Kofi is still asleep after 4. This is something we will need to consult about.
I
*k

Kofi was not sleeping till 4pm. He fell asleep at around 3 because his teeth were hurting him a lot and had taken painkillers. Also he had not slept at all last night. He has terrible insomnia. I need some time to work on it with him. It is just that a lot is going on and this matter is not life threatening. Otherwise he is doing very well. He is as happy as ever and has come out of his shell a bit.
Are you going to be able to send me tomorrow any documents regarding our financial hardship for the benefit of the congressman....and the CHIP issue?
Yes I already put it on my schedule
Sorry I did not remember the earlier "k"
We need to figure out the mail situation. I will leave your mail in the mailbox today and tomorrow. I suggest that you have your mail forwarded automatically. If you have not done so already.
We will need to consult about that and the house in general.
What do you mean?

According to bahai law we have to establish separate residences during the year of waiting. The house is legal yours and mine. I can't sell it or modify it by myself etc. but that doesn't mean that it is your residence during this period. Please explain if you understand it differently.
It is your residence and you are entitled to your privacy. But there are many issues involved here that I think require consultation. Not only the house but the children etc.

What are the issues? Could you specify? And what about the children? What needs consultation other than visitation times and the occasional issues that need the consent of both parents? Please be more specific. And I don't understand what all of these things that you are bringing up have anything to do with your mail?
I don't think all of my concerns can be addressed via text. I think we need to have a proper bahai consultation with a mediator.
You still did not answer the question about mail.
Yes I will definitely have the mail forwarded. Thanks for reminding me.

I am assuming you are taking the boys to the theater with our car. That is great, but I am wondering if you could let me know in advance so that I don't plan anything for that time...until we can figure out an easier arrangement for the car. I found out by accident from Shenandoah just now. I don't need the car today. Thanks
I will be using moms car. That is why I didn't mention it to you.
But I do appreciate your willingness to consult about sharing the Mazda.
K
I have assumed all along that we are going to share it. I even remember something about that in the initial separation meeting.

I just forwarded an important email from vassar financial aid. Soraya has to go online and complete two documents. The first one is a promissory note and she may need your help. The second is an informational site that is required. I would like her to complete this today so we don't have to worry about her losing her aid. I will call her now about.
Is Soraya at home now?
K
Yes. She is in the shower.
K

I think Kofi is not doing well because he is bored to death. He has been like this since the beginning of the summer. It is just getting worse. He has no motivation and no friends. When he is awake he is fine. He talks and sings and cooks and practices. I am scratching my brain for ideas for him. Let me know if you can think of something.
I will. And I'll talk at the movie. I did the address change
K
The boys forgot to give you your mail. Could you remember to ask them to bring it to you when you drop them off.

Also the $360 that I withdrew last week is almost all gone. Shenandoah eats three peaches at one time. He eats a whole melon by himself in one sitting and he is always saying he is hungry. I had to put gas in the car to drive up to EWR and it is all gone. So $360 was only gas and food and it did not last very long!!! What do we do? We still have four days to go.
I don't know. Maybe tomorrow an idea.
K
Any ideas about $? I have to go grocery shopping today.
I'm at work will reply soon
Could you withdraw $50 from FMCU and make do with that?
K
Are u going to be out of the house any time today? I need to pick up a few things 15 minutes.
This making me very nervous. We really need to set up a deadline for the packing. And how many more times you need to come to 108.

The problem is I don't have much space here at all and I'm still trying to get reoriented it is very difficult to plan what I need and when especially with changing seasons etc. if we had a lot if storage here it would be very easy. There is space that can be used but I need time to figure out how to use it. Also I don't yet know where to put the filing cabinet and some other bulky things. For now I need 15 minutes today.
In that case could you give me a date by which we could come up with a deadline. i.e. deadline of a deadline

I don't know if it makes sense for me to commit to a deadline. I could say that by September 1 I could have most of the stuff I need out but I do not want to commit to a deadline in the sense that after that date I have no right to come and get anything else I might have forgotten.

Well we can make provisions for that. For example, I could always send it to you whatever it is. Or alternatively we could agree on a number of times in which you could come for that reason after the deadline. It is the open endedness that does not work for me. Another five weeks of you coming and going is too long for me. Could you think of a closer date than sep 1? And it y
And if your final word is that you cannot commit to anything. Then I have to consult with experts about this.

Of course I am obliged to obey whatever is the civil law. On the other hand we are also obliged to follow the principles of consultation which is not possible for me by text. So I propose that we consult properly with a bahai mediator with whom both of us are comfortable. I will ask the PAC about this in Wednesday. Definitely I agree that having stuff sent over by the kids is a good idea. It is just that I have many books and files and other papers and most of that they won't be able to sort through and we don't have space for it here.
In the meantime could you please let me stop by for 15 minutes so I can move forward with my chores for today.

You could come in today, but I just got settled down to study. I don't know when I will need a break. I will let you know. I really hope you are not going to ask for this every other day until we reach an agreement (soon). I want this to be resolved by the end of this coming week.
I am very willing to sit down with a mediator any time this Coming week.
Also if you are not needing the car on Wednesday from about 6 pm I will use it. Please let me know.
I don't need the car on Wednesday after 6pm.
K
Please could you arrange for a mediator yourself because as far as I am concerned we don't need one for the packing issue.

I will be happy to but I thought you would want to have a say about who it is. And again I think the principle here at least for me is that we need to consult about everything. Or another way to put it is that if one party wants to consult the othe should agree to do so.

I am agreeing to consult but only because you feel you need to. Somethings are straight forward for me and I don't see the point of mediation. It is a waste of time. But again if it is a complicated matter for you I don't have a choice but to participate.
And about who the mediator will be I will leave it to you. If you come up with someone completely unsuitable to me then you can always ask someone else.
K
On the other hand one party cannot push or force the other to consult. It has to be something both sincerely want to do.
I have no problem with consultation in itself. It is just that I don't believe that it is suitable for all and every situation. Sometimes it is not needed.
Great thanks.
I going to go for a walk from 11-11:45.
K
You have mail from last week. It is on the red chest
Do u have any objections if I spend time with the kids at the house tomorrow 1-4 pm?
I thought we had agreed on Tuesday afternoon already. I was expecting you to do that since last week.
Great

About tomorrow, please try to move things as much/many as you can keeping in mind that you are not going to come to 108 too many more times. You have already packed stuff during at least 6 visits. It is not reasonable to ask for many more. Also please come up with a deadline about the packing ASAP. Maybe after your PAC meeting.
I will talk with PAC about these points.
Please do not text me until I contact u on Thursday - unless there is something urgent. Thanks.
K
Did you recently change the ID or password of our Fmfcu account?
No

I can't access out bank account. I need to buy groceries for today and I have no idea what is going on. If there is no money in the bank and your paycheck has not come in yet, I will have to go and sell the gold bracelet.
S for your town
The pay heck has cleared. There is $639. I am calling FMCU to see if we can delay payment for the big loan due aug 5.
I will withdraw $130 for the 2 weeks.
FMCU says they will have someone call me about my request to defer the aug and sep payments.
The FMCU pword was set on may 7 according to the most recent email I have on that topic.
Correction the current balance is 693
I am worried about all the other automatic payments. I don't think that 580 will cover them. And what about daily? What about mortgage? AT&T due aug 15?
I just spoke with Wells Fargo told them there is a delay until unemployment check comes in they said fine and they will call me again next Monday.
About AT&T we don't have money for that my suggestion is u call them and explain your first paycheck won't arrive until end if September and maybe they will allow deferment.
Can we defer most of the payments. I need at least 400 for two weeks. Shenandoah has turned into a gobbling machine. Plus dr hunts check of 170 is going to be cashed this week.
I will call AT&T.
What about all those gazillion other bills of the coming two weeks???
I have already contacted FMCU and Santander. I will talk with Santander on aug 15 and FMCU will be calling me soon.
Who is Santander ?
Car payment
What about aqua and peco? Ortho? Travelers ?
I have no idea other than to hope there is enough unemployment money to cover them and mortgage. We had agreed that Soraya would pay us $500 for her half of the laptop.
She did already
When is the unemployment coming?
When was the $500 deposited in our checking account?
It was in cash sometime in July. You should be able to see it there as a transaction.
Cash deposit that is.
I don't know when the uc deposit will arrive. I will try to call them.

I just learned that I am getting only $304 per week. The first payment should arrive very soon and should be a double payment so it will be 608. I have no suggestions about the mortgage except that I talk to them immediately and explain the payments are not possible until end of sept. but before I do that I recommend that u call like brown and get his advice about what should be done.

I just did the calculations based on 800/month for the whole family for daily. This is the number we would come up with as a minimum. The result of the calculations is 40 per person per week so that means 80 per two weeks. 130 for you alone is too much.
I have additional expenses. I am driving soon so can't respond at length have to take into account gas and train tix.
What is the deadline to enroll me with bmc insurance
I have train tickets too so does Soraya and the children have incidentals. I can't tell them not to go uptown with their friends to buy a soda for example.
Bmc insurance
What do you mean deadline with BMC?
I already asked for it and they are going to provide it aug 1. I don't know anything about deadline
I would like to consult further about the idea if 40.a person later when I'm not driving.
Is Soraya still going into the city each week and if so how many times per week
There is a two week break including this one. So she is starting again on the 12 th August. She goes to philly twice a week.
90 is Gr check I cashed today
But I need to pay back mom $100 she lent me for teeth cleaning
Teeth cleaning??? Couldn't you have waited till our salaries come in???? We have no money to feed the children and you go teeth cleaning??? I am outraged.
I am sitting here trying to feed them stuff from the pantry, trying to be creative saving every penny for gas and food and you go teeth cleaning????
I have cut down on all wants including deserts and you go teeth cleaning?? What's next?

This was a cleaning and checkup with dr Saleh scheduled long ago. I could have changed the date to October but I'm sure dr Saleh would have said that is too long a delay given the risky situation with my teeth. Also since the separation occurred on July 14 I was not remembering matters like that. In any case my mother lent me the money so it works out the same in the end because I can repay her in October. I'm sure we can consult about funds in more detail later.
I would like to pick up a few tools from the garage later tonight. I will of course not be entering the house.
Yes please pay her later. We need to figure out our finances for the next two weeks ASAP. Tonight?
What tool do you need? Your tool box is in the den!!
Garden tools
Please answer about the finances and when we are going to discuss that
I'm late I can't do it by text anyway. If u want to talk by phone at about.9 I can do that
No I can't talk by phone at all. I'll wait until you are ready to discuss by text

I will create. Budget using an online tool and u can do the same then we can deal with the numbers more clearly. This is a suggestion from the PAC. I will look for the tool tomorrow and send u the link.
K

Apparently the best online budget tool is mint.com. Please have a look at it. If we decide to use it we have to give the bank name member number and password. But everything I've read says it is secure.
I will look at it this afternoon.
Do we have any money in the $500 Fmfcu credit line?
Did you call unemployment to find out about when your first check is coming?
Please check the FMCU website to answer the first question.
As a general rule please do not ask me to do anything that you can do with your computer at home.
I am trying to reach the uc offices but it is very difficult by phone
There is still 217.98 available in the line of credit

I confirmed with unemployment people. They made an error and the money should appear in the FMCU account in 2-3 business days so probably Monday. I also confirmed that I am receiving the highest possible weekly payment for anyone which is $573. Nobody can receive any more than that. But the amount is reduced because of my strayer earnings and then taxes are taken out so the uc weekly payment is only 304.
I did they said he is in court today I should try tomorrow morning and/or send email. I have so much to do I haven't gotten around to emailing him.
If u email him today I will follow up tomorrow with calling him.
L
*k
I just emailed U the budget forms. Please choose the one u prefer and then we can both work on it and compare figures.
Give me some time I am tired right now. Will get to it today
If I don't suggest a time in my texts or emails that means I am not intending any time frame other than what u choose.
K
I've done a quick review. The first one rohdelaw might be best because it is an excel file.
Are they gonna pay you weekly or biweekly? On Monday/ Tuesday are you gonna get 304 or 608?
Weekly I don't know yet what I will be getting. I forgot to ask.
Will there be feast tonight? I think it is important that Shenandoah be involved somehow.
He needs to keep some connection with the faith especially at this age.

Yes there is feast tonight. It is difficult to teach the kids about the Faith when they have never had any stability in their lives, no bahai friends, and bad example at home etc. I have tried to teach them for years and years. I would sit down with them with note books, tests and exams. I organized bahai class teachers in Beirut (three of them). I pray with them. Listen to talks with them. I initiated them going to Tabarsi Camp etc I can go on and on about how much I have done for them. I have tried to live the example as much as possible. But I cannot force them and I will not. It is what it is. He knows it is his feast but he doesn't want to participate. I wouldn't either if I were him. Who wants to live in tension.
So this is another matter for consultation.

I will also ask you to stop making negative comments about me once and for all. I am agreeing to communicate with you by text at your request so that we can get things done for the sake of the children. But I will not accept being a target of your negative remarks. If you cannot communicate with me in a civil manner then just let me know so I can contact joe and don and ask them for help.
For my part from now on will take care not to mention anything except the practical tasks.
Yes i think that is a great idea.

I am looking at mint.com and I think I get the gist of it. But I think it is not worth working with it, because we need to separate our accounts and financial matters soon. This will be done through a separation agreement in which we agree on who pays what. This way we will not harass each other about this spending or that. For example, I won't be able to tell you why in the world did you make that decision about teeth cleaning. Meanwhile we have to try to play it by ear until we make the separation agreement. I just need time to find the right attorney and I am too busy with the sociology paper for the next ten days. And about the links you emailed me, what are they about? I mean why do I need to look at them?
We do not have money for an attorney. Ease explain how you plan to pay for that.
The PAC suggested that we use those forms to create a budget that fairly distributes the money.
I don't know yet. But I think we need one.
The PAC said usually the lawyers get involved more toward the end of the year but you should talk to the PAC directly about that.
The separation agreement will deal with visitation, the car etc as well.

One thing that u could do without delay is open your account somewhere and arrange for your paycheck to be deposited there. That will save time once it is decided how to divide up the rest of the summer income.
If there is nothing urgent I would like to hold off on any texting until Monday.
I have already done that.
I mean my own account
Great that makes things easier. Then eventually I can change my account pword and that will be settled.
Well I probably will have to remove myself from yours...
Yep but that should be easy. Okay that is all the texting for now unless it is urgent. Thanks.
